verses.verse: קִרְב֤וּ <WH7126> Come near גוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> ye nations לִשְׁמֹ֔עַ <WH8085> to hear וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> ye people הַקְשִׁ֑יבוּ <WH7181> and hearken תִּשְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> hear הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> let the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> and all that is therein תֵּבֵ֖ל <WH8398> the world וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צֶאֱצָאֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6631> and all things that come forth

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for קֶ֤צֶף <WH7110> For the indignation לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> is against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> [is] upon all nations וְחֵמָ֖ה <WH2534> and [his] fury עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all צְבָאָ֑ם <WH6635> upon all their armies הֶחֱרִימָ֖ם <WH2763> he hath utterly destroyed נְתָנָ֥ם <WH5414> them he hath delivered לַטָּֽבַח׃ <WH2874> them to the slaughter

וְחַלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH2491> Their slain יֻשְׁלָ֔כוּ <WH7993> also shall be cast out וּפִגְרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6297> out of their carcases יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> shall come up בָאְשָׁ֑ם <WH889> and their stink וְנָמַ֥סּוּ <WH4549> shall be melted הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> and the mountains מִדָּמָֽם׃ <WH1818> with their blood

וְנָמַ֙קּוּ֙ <WH4743> shall be dissolved כָּל־ <WH3605> and all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> And all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְנָגֹ֥לּוּ <WH1556> shall be rolled together כַסֵּ֖פֶר <WH5612> as a scroll הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> and the heavens וְכָל־ <WH3605> All צְבָאָ֣ם <WH6635> and all their host יִבּ֔וֹל <WH5034> shall fall down כִּנְבֹ֤ל <WH5034> falleth off עָלֶה֙ <WH5929> as the leaf מִגֶּ֔פֶן <WH1612> from the vine וּכְנֹבֶ֖לֶת <WH5034> and as a falling מִתְּאֵנָֽה׃ <WH8384> [fig] from the fig tree

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רִוְּתָ֥ה <WH7301> shall be bathed בַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> in heaven חַרְבִּ֑י <WH2719> For my sword הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> Behold עַל־ <WH5921> upon אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> upon Idumea תֵּרֵ֔ד <WH3381> behold it shall come down וְעַל־ <WH5921> and upon עַ֥ם <WH5971> and upon the people חֶרְמִ֖י <WH2764> of my curse לְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> to judgment

חֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> The sword לַיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> of the LORD מָלְאָ֥ה <WH4390> is filled דָם֙ <WH1818> with blood הֻדַּ֣שְׁנָה <WH1878> it is made fat מֵחֵ֔לֶב <WH2459> with fatness מִדַּ֤ם <WH1818> [and] with the blood כָּרִים֙ <WH3733> of lambs וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <WH6260> and goats מֵחֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> with the fat כִּלְי֣וֹת <WH3629> of the kidneys אֵילִ֑ים <WH352> of rams כִּ֣י <WH3588> has a זֶ֤בַח <WH2077> hath a sacrifice לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> for the LORD בְּבָצְרָ֔ה <WH1224> in Bozrah וְטֶ֥בַח <WH2874> slaughter גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and a great בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> of Idumea

וְיָרְד֤וּ <WH3381> shall come down רְאֵמִים֙ <WH7214> And the unicorns עִמָּ֔ם <WH5973> them וּפָרִ֖ים <WH6499> with them and the bullocks עִם־ <WH5973> with אַבִּירִ֑ים <WH47> with the bulls וְרִוְּתָ֤ה <WH7301> shall be soaked אַרְצָם֙ <WH776> and their land מִדָּ֔ם <WH1818> with blood וַעֲפָרָ֖ם <WH6083> and their dust מֵחֵ֥לֶב <WH2459> with fatness יְדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <WH1878> made fat

כִּ֛י <WH3588> has a י֥וֹם <WH3117> For [it is] the day נָקָ֖ם <WH5359> vengeance לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD'S שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> [and] the year שִׁלּוּמִ֖ים <WH7966> of recompences לְרִ֥יב <WH7379> for the controversy צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> of Zion

וְנֶהֶפְכ֤וּ <WH2015> thereof shall be turned נְחָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5158> And the streams לְזֶ֔פֶת <WH2203> into pitch וַעֲפָרָ֖הּ <WH6083> and the dust לְגָפְרִ֑ית <WH1614> thereof into brimstone וְהָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> will become אַרְצָ֔הּ <WH776> and the land לְזֶ֖פֶת <WH2203> pitch בֹּעֵרָֽה׃ <WH1197> thereof shall become burning

לַ֤יְלָה <WH3915> night וְיוֹמָם֙ <WH3119> nor day לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִכְבֶּ֔ה <WH3518> It shall not be quenched לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> thereof shall go up עֲשָׁנָ֑הּ <WH6227> the smoke מִדּ֤וֹר <WH1755> from generation לָדוֹר֙ <WH1755> to generation תֶּחֱרָ֔ב <WH2717> it shall lie waste לְנֵ֣צַח <WH5331> it for ever נְצָחִ֔ים <WH5331> and ever אֵ֥ין <WH369> None עֹבֵ֖ר <WH5674> none shall pass through בָּֽהּ׃

וִירֵשׁ֙וּהָ֙ <WH3423> shall possess קָאַ֣ת <WH6893> But the cormorant וְקִפּ֔וֹד <WH7090> and the bittern וְיַנְשׁ֥וֹף <WH3244> it the owl וְעֹרֵ֖ב <WH6158> also and the raven יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall dwell בָ֑הּ וְנָטָ֥ה <WH5186> in it and he shall stretch out עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> over קַֽו־ <WH6957> upon it the line תֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> of confusion וְאַבְנֵי־ <WH68> and the stones בֹֽהוּ׃ <WH922> of emptiness

חֹרֶ֥יהָ <WH2715> the nobles וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> else שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there מְלוּכָ֣ה <WH4410> thereof to the kingdom יִקְרָ֑אוּ <WH7121> They shall call וְכָל־ <WH3605> its שָׂרֶ֖יהָ <WH8269> but none [shall be] there and all her princes יִ֥הְיוּ <WH1961> become אָֽפֶס׃ <WH657> shall be nothing

וְעָלְתָ֤ה <WH5927> shall come up אַרְמְנֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH759> in her palaces סִירִ֔ים <WH5518> And thorns קִמּ֥וֹשׂ <WH7057> nettles וָח֖וֹחַ <WH2336> and brambles בְּמִבְצָרֶ֑יהָ <WH4013> in the fortresses וְהָיְתָה֙ <WH1961> will also be a נְוֵ֣ה <WH5116> thereof and it shall be an habitation תַנִּ֔ים <WH8577> of dragons חָצִ֖יר <WH2681> [and] a court לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> first יַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3284> of ostriches

וּפָגְשׁ֤וּ <WH6298> shall also meet צִיִּים֙ <WH6728> The wild beasts of the desert אֶת־ <WH854> with אִיִּ֔ים <WH338> with the wild beasts of the island וְשָׂעִ֖יר <WH8163> and the satyr עַל־ <WH5921> unto רֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> to his fellow יִקְרָ֑א <WH7121> shall cry אַךְ־ <WH389> Yes שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הִרְגִּ֣יעָה <WH7280> also shall rest לִּילִ֔ית <WH3917> the screech owl וּמָצְאָ֥ה <WH4672> there and find לָ֖הּ מָנֽוֹחַ׃ <WH4494> for herself a place of rest

שָׁ֣מָּה <WH8033> there קִנְּנָ֤ה <WH7077> make her nest קִפּוֹז֙ <WH7091> There shall the great owl וַתְּמַלֵּ֔ט <WH4422> and lay וּבָקְעָ֖ה <WH1234> and hatch וְדָגְרָ֣ה <WH1716> and gather בְצִלָּ֑הּ <WH6738> under her shadow אַךְ־ <WH389> Yes שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there נִקְבְּצ֥וּ <WH6908> also be gathered דַיּ֖וֹת <WH1772> there shall the vultures אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> every one רְעוּתָֽהּ׃ <WH7468> with her mate

דִּרְשׁ֨וּ <WH1875> Seek ye out מֵֽעַל־ <WH5921> from סֵ֤פֶר <WH5612> of the book יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וּֽקְרָ֔אוּ <WH7121> and read אַחַ֤ת <WH259> no one מֵהֵ֙נָּה֙ <WH2007> of these לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נֶעְדָּ֔רָה <WH5737> shall fail אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> none רְעוּתָ֖הּ <WH7468> her mate לֹ֣א <WH3808> not פָקָ֑דוּ <WH6485> shall want כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For פִי֙ <WH6310> for my mouth ה֣וּא <WH1931> he צִוָּ֔ה <WH6680> it hath commanded וְרוּח֖וֹ <WH7307> and his spirit ה֥וּא <WH1931> he קִבְּצָֽן׃ <WH6908> it hath gathered

וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> He הִפִּ֤יל <WH5307> And he hath cast לָהֶן֙ <WH1992> like גּוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> the lot וְיָד֛וֹ <WH3027> for them and his hand חִלְּקַ֥תָּה <WH2505> hath divided לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> by בַּקָּ֑ו <WH6957> it unto them by line עַד־ <WH5704> it for עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> ever יִֽירָשׁ֔וּהָ <WH3423> they shall possess לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> from generation וָד֖וֹר <WH1755> to generation יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall they dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס
